name: The Other Side (sunnybair)
description:
While visiting a friend for a sleepover as a child, you ended up getting pulled through the magical mirror in their attic and suddenly found yourself in a whole new world!

A world full of monsters and magic may have been too hard to handle back then, but now that you've grown, the time has come for you to set off on your adventure, carving your way across the land with a magical sword at your side.

How will you make a name for yourself?

  • Features a customizable MC including gender, hair, skin, and eye colors!
  • Form relationships with the NPC's on your journey!
  • Learn about the new fantasy world you've gotten stuck in and develop the skills needed to survive in its harsh environment!

Currently,  the story is only just beginning, but more chapters will continue to be released regularly, so stay tuned for updates!

If you enjoy the story, please consider paying to support the author!
